name: Ancient Genocide
description:
Strategically protect your hero and destroy the enemy with units and skills. The begnning is simple but it becomes more challenging.

Units
- Pikeman
- Swordsman
- Archer
- Healer
- Tank
- Kingsguard
- Fire Mage
- Electro Mage
- Skeleton Mage
- Bee Princess
- King
- Priest
- Ballista
- Catapult
- Hunter

Levels
- 8 normal
- 2 boss
- 2 tower defense
- 2 warlord
- 2 farming
- 2 conquer
- 2 confrontation
- 2 Defense of the Ancient

Skills
- Armor
- Damage
- Lightning bolts
- Fire defense
- Skeletons
- Scorpions/Rats/Bats/Crabs/Bloody Eyes
- Renews

A multiplayer mode of the game is planned but has no deadline yet.

No microtransactions, no internet required, just the full game.
